00176    template <class Interaction>
00177    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::BondPotentialImpl(Simulation& simulation)
00178     : BondPotential(simulation),
00179       interactionPtr_(0)
00180    {  interactionPtr_ = new Interaction(); }

00183    * Default constructor.
00184    */
00185    template <class Interaction>
00186    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::BondPotentialImpl()
00187     : BondPotential(),
00188       interactionPtr_(0)
00189    {  interactionPtr_ = new Interaction(); }
00190  
00191    /* 
00192    * Destructor. 
00193    */
00194    template <class Interaction>
00195    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~BondPotentialImpl() 
00196    {
00197       if (interactionPtr_) {
00198          delete interactionPtr_;
00199          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00200       }
00201    }

00204    * Set the maximum number of atom types.

00206    template <class Interaction>
00207    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::setNBondType(int nBondType)
00208    {  interaction().setNBondType(nBondType); }

00210    /*
00211    * Read bond interaction parameters.
00212    */
00213    template <class Interaction>
00214    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00215    {
00216       readBegin(in,"BondPotential");
00217       bool nextIndent = false;
00218       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00219       readEnd(in);
00220    }

00228    {  return interaction().energy(rsq, bondTypeId); }

00261    /*
00262    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00263    */
00264    template <class Interaction>
00265    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00266    {  addForces(true, false);  }
00267 
00268    /*
00269    * Increment atomic forces and compute pair energy for this processor.
00270    */
00271    template <class Interaction>
00272    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(double& energy)
00273    {  energy = addForces(true, true);  }
00274 
00275    /*
00276    * Compute total bond energy on all processors.
00277    */
00278    template <class Interaction>
00279    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00280    void 
00281    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00282    #else
00283    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00284    #endif
00285    { 
00286       double localEnergy = 0.0; 
00287       localEnergy = addForces(false, true); 
00288       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00289       double totalEnergy = 0.0; 
00290       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &totalEnergy, 1, 
00291                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00292       setEnergy(totalEnergy);
00293       #else
00294       setEnergy(localEnergy);
00295       #endif
00296    }
00297 
00298    /*
00299    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00300    */
00301    template <class Interaction> double 
00302    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(bool needForce, bool needEnergy)
00303    {
00304       // Preconditions
00305       //if (!storage().isInitialized()) {
00306       //   UTIL_THROW("BondStorage must be initialized");
00307       //}
00308 
00309       Vector f;
00310       double rsq;
00311       double bondEnergy;
00312       double energy = 0.0;
00313       GroupIterator<2> iter;
00314       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00315       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00316       int type;
00317       int isLocal0, isLocal1;
00318 
00319       storage().begin(iter);
00320       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00321          type = iter->typeId();
00322          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00323          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00324          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00325          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00326          // Set f = r0 - r1, minimum image separation between atoms
00327          rsq = boundary().distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), 
00328                                         atom1Ptr->position(), f);
00329          if (needEnergy) {
00330             bondEnergy = interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type);
00331             if (isLocal0 && isLocal1) {
00332                energy += bondEnergy;
00333             } else {
00334                energy += 0.5*bondEnergy;
00335             }
00336          }
00337          if (needForce) {
00338             // Set force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00339             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type);
00340             if (isLocal0) {
00341                atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00342             }
00343             if (isLocal1) {
00344                atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00345             }
00346          }
00347       }
00348       return energy;
00349    }
00350 
00351    /*
00352    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00353    */
00354    template <class Interaction>
00355    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00356    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00357    #else
00358    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress()
00359    #endif
00360    {
00361       Tensor localStress;
00362       Vector dr;
00363       Vector f;
00364       double rsq, forceOverR;
00365       GroupIterator<2> iter;
00366       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00367       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00368       int    type;
00369       int    isLocal0, isLocal1;
00370 
00371       localStress.zero();
00372 
00373       // Iterate over bonds
00374       storage().begin(iter);
00375       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00376          type = iter->typeId();
00377          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00378          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00379          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00380          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00381          rsq = boundary().distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), 
00382                                         atom1Ptr->position(), dr);
00383          f = dr;
00384          assert(isLocal0 || isLocal1);
00385          if (isLocal0 && isLocal1) {
00386             forceOverR = interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type);
00387          } else {
00388             forceOverR = 0.5*interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type);
00389          }
00390          f *= forceOverR;
00391          incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00392       }
00393 
00394       // if (reverseUpdateFlag()) { } else { } 
00395 
00396       // Normalize by volume 
00397       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00398 
00399       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00400       // Reduce results from all processors
00401       Tensor totalStress;
00402       communicator.Reduce(&localStress(0, 0), &totalStress(0, 0), 
00403                           Dimension*Dimension, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00404       if (communicator.Get_rank() != 0) {
00405          totalStress.zero();
00406       }
00407       setStress(totalStress);
00408       #else
00409       setStress(localStress);
00410       #endif
00411 
00412    }
00413 
00414 }
00415 #endif
